Package dev.vernite.vernite.integration.git

Class GitTaskService

java.lang.Object
dev.vernite.vernite.integration.git.GitTaskService
@Service @Component public class GitTaskService extends Object
Service for managing task connected to any git service.

    • handleIssueAction

      public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<Issue> handleIssueAction(IssueAction action, Task task)
      Handle issue action for a given task.
      Parameters:
      action - the action to handle.
      task - the task to handle.
      Returns:
      flux with changed issues.

    • createIssue

      public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<Issue> createIssue(Task task)
      Creates issue in appropriate git service.
      Parameters:
      task - must not be null.
      Returns:
      Mono with created issue.

    • patchIssue

      public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<Issue> patchIssue(Task task)
      Applies changes to issue in appropriate git service.
      Parameters:
      task - must not be null. Should have changed since last patch or since creation.
      Returns:
      Mono with patched issue.

    • getIssues

      public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<Issue> getIssues(Project project)
      Gets issues from git integrations for given project.
      Parameters:
      project - must not be null; must be entity from database.
      Returns:
      Flux with issues.

    • connectIssue

      public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Issue> connectIssue(Task task, Issue issue)
      Connects given task with issue from git service.
      Parameters:
      task - must not be null; must be entity from database.
      issue - must not be null; must be returned by getIssues.
      Returns:
      Mono with connected task.

    • deleteIssue

      public void deleteIssue(Task task)
      Deletes git issue connections for given task.
      Parameters:
      task - must not be null; must be entity from database.

    • handlePullAction

      public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<PullRequest> handlePullAction(PullAction action, Task task)
      Handles pull action for a given task.
      Parameters:
      action - the action to handle.
      task - the task to handle.
      Returns:
      flux with changed pull requests.

    • getPullRequests

      public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<PullRequest> getPullRequests(Project project)
      Gets pull requests from git integrations for given project.
      Parameters:
      project - must not be null; must be entity from database.
      Returns:
      Flux with pull requests.

    • connectPullRequest

      public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<PullRequest> connectPullRequest(Task task, PullRequest pullRequest)
      Connects given task with pull request from git service.
      Parameters:
      task - must not be null; must be entity from database.
      pullRequest - must not be null; must be returned by getPullRequests.
      Returns:
      Mono with connected pull request.

    • deletePullRequest

      public void deletePullRequest(Task task)
      Deletes git pull request connections for given task.
      Parameters:
      task - must not be null; must be entity from database.
